key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including potential fines and reputational damage
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities due to past data breaches
Customer complaints and unresolved issues impacting reputation
Economic sensitivity to regional downturns in the Northeastern U.S.
Competitive pressures from larger national banks and fintech firms
controversies: Data breach class-action lawsuit impacting 160,000-200,000 customers
Numerous unresolved customer complaints reflected in BBB rating of B-
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint as part of ESG initiatives
social_issues: Improving workforce diversity as part of ESG initiatives
Customer trust erosion due to data breach and unresolved complaints
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks as a bank holding company
Need for enhanced cybersecurity governance following data breach
